name: Spencer K. Cottrell
tagline: AI systems + research artifacts: papers, models, demos, and engineering work — built for reproducibility, clarity, and signal.

about.headline: Research hub + technical portfolio
about.body: I build and document AI systems with an emphasis on reproducibility, clarity, and high-signal artifacts. This site curates papers, models, demos, and infrastructure work—so reviewers can quickly understand what I built, why it matters, and how to reproduce it.

philosophy.title: Modern Alchemy (Systems Lens)
philosophy.summary: A systems-first framing for capability growth, constraints, and real-world deployment tradeoffs.
